chapter.text: 56|1|Dang na jian dashi fasheng de shihou,
56|2|meiyou renhe ren fouren qi fasheng.
56|3|Na jian dashi jiang shi neng shi ren jiangji, neng shi ren shengji de;
56|4|dang da di zhendang,
56|5|shanluan fensui,
56|6|hua wei sanman de chen'ai,
56|7|er nimen fen wei san deng de shihou.
56|8|Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|9|Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|10|Zui xianxing shan zhe, shi zui xianru leyuan de ren,
56|11|zhe deng ren, que shi meng zhu juangu de.
56|12|Tamen zai enze de leyuan zhong.
56|13|Xuduo qian ren
56|14|he shaoshu hou ren,
56|15|zai zhubao xiang cheng de chuangta shang,
56|16|Bici xiangdui di kao zai shangmian.
56|17|Changsheng bulao de tong pu, lunliu zhefu dai tamen,
56|18|pengzhe zhan he hu, yu man bei de liquan;
56|19|tamen bu yin na liquan er toutong, ye bu mingding.
56|20|Tamen you ziji suo xuanze de shuiguo,
56|21|he ziji suo aihao de niao rou.
56|22|Hai you baixi de, mei mudi qizi,
56|23|haoxiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang.
56|24|Na shi weile baochou tamen de shanxing.
56|25|Tamen zai leyuan li, ting bu dao e yan he huanghua,
56|26|dan ting dao shuo: Zhu nimen ping'an! Zhu nimen ping'an!
56|27|Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|28|Tamen xiangshou wu ci de suanzao shu,
56|29|jieshi leilei de (xiangjiao) shu;
56|30|manman de shu yin;
56|31|fanfan de liushui;
56|32|fengfu de shuiguo,
56|33|si shi bu jue, keyi suiyi zhai shi;
56|34|yu bei sheng qi de chuangta.
56|35|Wo shi tamen chongxin shengzhang,
56|36|wo shi tamen chang wei chunu,
56|37|yilian zhangfu, bici tong sui;
56|38|zhexie dou shi xingfu zhe suo xiangshou de.
56|39|Xuduo qian ren
56|40|he xuduo hou ren.
56|41|Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren?
56|42|Tamen zai du feng he feishui zhong,
56|43|zai hei yan de yinying xia,
56|44|ji bu liangshuang, you bu meiguan.
56|45|Yiqian tamen que shi shechi de,
56|46|que shi guzhi dazui de,
56|47|tamen chang shuo:“Nandao women si hou, yi bian cheng chentu he kugu de shihou, women biding yao fuhuo ma? ”
56|48|Lian women de zuxian, ye yao fuhuo ma?”
56|49|Ni shuo: Qian ren he hou ren,
56|50|zai yige zhuming de riqi he teding shijian biding yao bei jihe.
56|51|Ranhou mi wu de, fouren fuhuo de renmen a!
56|52|Nimen biding shi zan hu mu de guoshi,
56|53|er yi ta chongji,
56|54|ranhou tong yin feishui,
56|55|xiang hai xiao ke bing de luotuo yin liangshui yiyang.
56|56|Zhe shi tamen zai baoying zhi ri suo shou de kuandai.
56|57|Wo ceng chuangzao nimen, nimen zen buxin fuhuo ne?
56|58|Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo she de jingye,
56|59|jiujing shi nimen ba ta zaocheng ren ne? Haishi wo ba ta zaocheng ren ne?
56|60|Wo ceng jiang siwang fenpei ji nimen, renhe ren buneng zunao wo,
56|61|bu rang wo gaibian nimen de pin xing, er shi nimen shengzhang zai nimen suo buzhi de zhuangtai zhong.
56|62|Nimen que yi zhidao chuci de shengzhang, nimen zen bu juewu ne?
56|63|Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo gengzhong de zhuangjia,
56|64|jiujing shi nimen shi ta fa rong ne? Haishi wo shi ta fa rong ne?
56|65|Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi shi ta diaoling, er nimen bian cheng chayi zhe,
56|66|nimen jiang shuo:“Women shi zao sunshi de.”
56|67|Buran, women shi bei boduo de.”
56|68|Nimen gaosu ba! Nimen suo yin de shui,
56|69|jiujing shi nimen shi ta cong yun shang jiangxia de ne? Haishi wo shi ta jiangxia de ne?
56|70|Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi shi ta bian cheng ku de, nimen zenme bu ganxie ne?
56|71|Nimen gaosu ba! Nimen suo zuan qu de huo;
56|72|jiujing shi nimen shi sui mu shengzhang de ne? Haishi wo shi ta shengzhang de ne?
56|73|Wo yi ta wei jiaoxun, bingqie yi ta wei huangye de jumin de weiji,
56|74|gu ni yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
56|75|Wo bi yi xingsu de moluo chu mengshi,
56|76|zhe que shi yige zhongda de mengshi, jiaruo nimen zhidao.
56|77|Zhe que shi baogui de “gulanjing”,
56|78|jilu zai zhencang de jing ben zhong,
56|79|zhiyou chunjie zhe cai de fumo na jing ben.
56|80|“Gulanjing” shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de.
56|81|Nandao nimen miaoshi zhe xun ci,
56|82|er yi fouren daiti ganxie ma?
56|83|(Nimen) zenme buzai linghun dao jiang sizhe de yanhou de shihou
56|84|na shihou, nimen dajia kanzhe ta,
56|85|wo bi nimen geng linjin ta, dan nimen bu xiaode,
56|86|ruguo nimen bushi shou baoying de,
56|87|nimen zen bu shi linghun fu fan yu benwei ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.
56|88|Ruguo ta shi bei juangu de,
56|89|name, ta jiang xiangshou shushi, jiyang yu enze de leyuan;
56|90|ruguo ta shi xingfu zhe,
56|91|name, yiban xingfu de ren jiang dui ta shuo: Zhu ni ping'an!
56|92|Ruguo ta shi mi wu de, fouren fuhuo zhe,
56|93|name, ta jiang xiangshou feishui de kuandai,
56|94|he liehuo de shaozhuo.
56|95|Zhe que shi wu ke zhiyi de zhenli.
56|96|Gu ni yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
